TopicTitle: The origin of the loading screen

Articles.Content: I was looking on this thread (http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/120-Kerbal-Space-Program-Fanart) when I found the origin of the loading screen. The 8th and 9th post say it all. I couldn't copy or re-post for some reason.
Nice one. Didn't know it was fan art
